Antharas Watchman Theodric:
What?.I Theodric, Antharas Watchman...
My calling is to guard Antaras, the creation of the cursed Goddess Shilen. I make sure he never wakes up. For the sake of this mission, I gave my soul to the Darkness and turned into the undead.
Even if you go into the cave, you will not get to the nest of Antaras. To get inside, you need to use Portal Stone and activate Chained Heart...
